thread.title: Priyanka Gandhi Vadra Makes First Appearance In Congress Campaign For U.P. Assembly Polls
thread.title_full: Priyanka Gandhi Vadra Makes First Appearance In Congress Campaign For U.P. Assembly Polls

author: Betwa Sharma
title: Priyanka Gandhi Vadra Makes First Appearance In Congress Campaign For U.P. Assembly Polls
text:
Priyanka Gandhi Vadra Makes First Appearance In Congress Campaign For U.P. Assembly Polls Vadra led the negotiations to forge an alliance with the Samajwadi Party. 17/02/2017 4:08 PM IST | Updated 0 minutes ago Betwa Sharma Politics Editor, HuffPost India ANI/Twitter ADVERTISEMENT 
LUCKNOW, Uttar Pradesh -- Following months of speculation over her role in the Uttar Pradesh Assembly polls, Priyanka Gandhi Vadra today attended her first election rally in Rae Bareli, which is also the parliamentary seat of her mother Sonia Gandhi and before that her grandmother, Indira Gandhi. 
Vadra, who led the negotiations to forge an alliance with the Samajwadi Party, shared the stage with her brother Congress Party vice president Rahul Gandhi. Rae Bareli, which accounts for five assembly and will vote on 23 February, has been a source of intense haggling between the SP and the Congress. 
On Friday, Vadra looked on as Gandhi ripped into the Prime Minister Narendra Modi over various issues including demonetisation and the plight of farmers. "The note ban has terribly hurt small businessmen, shopkeepers and farmers," he said. 
Mocking Modi, Gandhi said, "You know what Modi said when I asked him about waiving off farmers loans."Then, he gave a long pause before saying, "Nothing." 
On Modi's Swachh Bharat Abhiyan, Gandhi said, "The PM hands you a broom before going to the U.S. to meet President Barack Obama."
